title: (x) Mexico 68 Olympics font - (similar to) Mexcellent {Marcelo Rodi}
content: I’m looking for a font that’s pretty much similar to the logo used from the 68 Olympics. I’ve seen it on a few sites, even a poster around town so I’m sure there is one, I just can’t seem to find it.
author: AdamBegin

comments.content: Similar? take a look at [Pump Triline](http://web.archive.org/web/20090918103739/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/elsner_flake/pump_triline/?sample_text=MEXICO%2068&sample_size=74). There is another one that is closer but can’t remember right now.
Here it is: [Mexcellent](http://web.archive.org/web/20090918103739/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/mexcellent/) by Ray Larabie
